history.content: I interned on the infrastructure team for a larger company last summer. The interview was pretty similar to interviews for more general software engineering positions. i.e. algorithmic questions, etc. They do like to hear about how your decisions are data driven though, so you might want to bring that up. Some companies publish engineering blogs about their infrastructures as well - do some research before the interview.

Not really related to school, but I was wondering if anyone would be open to answering a few questions through email about them. I got an offer recently and would like to know what subjects from past classes to review
history.subject: Has anyone here done an Infrastructure internship?
